DOC.brief_summary: The effect of the balloon on weight loss is investigated by multiple studies. However, the effect of the sequential balloons is not studied yet.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Weight Loss Effect of the Sequential Balloons
DOC.detailed_description: We are aiming to study the effect of the sequential balloons in the patients who had weight loss with the first balloon and they need subsequent balloons to have more weight loss after their first balloons are removed after 6 months.
DOC.criteria: BMI > 45 and weight >120 Kg Patients refused to have bariatric surgery. Esophageal or gastric or duodenal lesions. Bleeding disorders. uncooperative patients.
